description:
keyboard controls are very responsive on Fedora 32 / Gnome (Wayland) with i5-4590s. Graphics are simple but appealing. Sound - ok but not really to my taste.

(Pretty sure I've played the webGL version of this - the port seems pretty close.)

Maybe the dev could add a senior citizen mode where the vehicle would slowly heal itself from the damage I inflict...
i just came across this game and started playing

This is an interesting idea for a game, and has decent graphics, but it only has one track, one vehicle, and is singleplayer. It has 4.5 minutes of playtime (3 loops around one track) if you don't get bored after the first loop. I believe this was intended to demonstrate the WebGL graphics library, but it should not qualify as a game. (Even some of the worst alpha-version games I've played are more interesting than this.) I will say that it could have interesting potential with more tracks/vehicles, but it does not seem that that is the intended direction for the game.
ESTA DEL TIRO USTEDES ME ENTIENDEN NO
On recommande, même si on pleure le fait qu'il n'y ai qu'un unique niveau.
summary: Fun, simple au démarrage très rapide

description: В общем нормально, но есть проблемы для доработки.
